metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

** Reserved Instance pricing  is not available in local pricing cache  and calculations are based on approximate savings **","style":"warning"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"UseLocalPriceInfo","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"lo"},"name":"text - 31"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let workstart={PeakHourStart};
let workend={PeakHourEnd};
let timezoneoffset=4;
{VMSizeList}
let inv=VMComputer
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where AzureSubscriptionId in ({subscription:subid}) or '*' in ({subscription:subid})
| where tostring(split(_ResourceId,'/')[4])  in ({rg}) or '*' in ({rg})
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ResourceId=_ResourceId
| project ResourceId , Computer , AzureSize ,Cpus , CpuSpeed ,PhysicalMemoryMB;
let cpu=InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated)+timezoneoffset
| where hour between (workstart..workend)
| where Namespace == "Processor" 
| where Name == "UtilizationPercentage"
| summarize (cpu_p50,cpu_p95)=percentiles(Val,50,95),cpu_avg=avg(Val) by Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;
let mem=
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated)+timezoneoffset
| where Namespace == "Memory" 
| where Name == "AvailableMB"
| extend MemorySize = round(todouble(parse_json(Tags).["vm.azm.ms/memorySizeMB"]),0)
| extend MemUtil=(MemorySize-Val)/MemorySize*100
|summarize (mem_p95)=percentiles(MemUtil,95) by  Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;
let iops=
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated)+timezoneoffset
| where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
| where Name == "TransfersPerSecond"
|summarize (iops_p95)=percentiles(Val,95) by  Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;
let nwsent=InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated)+timezoneoffset
| where Namespace == "Network"
| where Name == "WriteBytesPerSecond" 
|summarize (nwsent)=percentiles(Val,95) by  Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;
let nwrec=InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated)+timezoneoffset
| where Namespace == "Network"
| where Name == "ReadBytesPerSecond" 
|summarize (nwrec)=percentiles(Val,95) by  Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;
let boot=Syslog
| where Facility =="daemon"
| where SyslogMessage startswith "Startup finished" 
| where ProcessID == 1 
|summarize bootcount=count() by Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId
|union  isfuzzy=true (Event
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where EventLog == "System" 
| where EventID == 1074 
|summarize bootcount=count() by Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId);
let logons=SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4624
| where LogonTypeName  =="10 - RemoteInteractive" 
| where Account !contains "Font Driver Host"  and  Account !contains "Window Manager"
| summarize ['SSH/RDP']=count() by Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId
|union  isfuzzy=true (Syslog
| where Facility == "auth"
| where SyslogMessage startswith "Accepted password for" or SyslogMessage startswith "Accepted publickey for"
| summarize ['SSH/RDP']=count() by Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId);
let vmcon=VMConnection
| where Direction == "inbound" 
| where SourceIp <> "127.0.0.1" 
| summarize InboundCon=sum(LinksEstablished+LinksTerminated+LinksLive) by Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;
inv
| join kind= leftouter (
   cpu
) on ResourceId
| join kind= leftouter (
   mem
) on ResourceId
| join kind= leftouter (
   iops
) on ResourceId
| join kind= leftouter (
   vmcon
) on ResourceId
| join kind= leftouter (
   vmsize
) on $left.AzureSize==$right.Name
|project Computer, AzureSize, Cpus,CpuSpeed, cpu_p95, mem_p95 , iops_p95 ,RAM=PhysicalMemoryMB,Disks,maxIops=Disks*500 ,ResourceId
| extend VmFamily=tostring(split(AzureSize,'_')[1])
| extend Fm1=substring(VmFamily,0,1) 
| extend Fm2=substring(VmFamily,1,1)
| extend Vmfamily=iff(Fm2 matches regex "[0-9]", Fm1, strcat(Fm1,Fm2))
|extend ramneed= RAM*mem_p95/100+500
| extend newram= case(
ramneed<0,RAM,
ramneed<1024,1024,
ramneed<2048,2048,
ramneed<3584,3584,
ramneed<4096,4096,
ramneed<7168,7168,
ramneed<8192,8192,
ramneed<14336,14336,
ramneed<16386,16384,
ramneed<28672,28672,
ramneed<32768,32768,0
)
| extend cpu_resize=iff(cpu_p95<toint("{CPUThreshold}") and Cpus !=1 ,"yes", "no")
| extend mem_resize=iff(mem_p95<toint("{MEMThreshold}") and newram < RAM,"yes", "no")
| extend iops_resize=iff(iops_p95<(maxIops*0.4),"yes", "no")
| extend newcpu= toint(iff (Cpus <= 2,2, Cpus/2))
| extend  CanResize=iff(cpu_resize =="yes" and mem_resize=="yes" and iops_resize == "yes" , "Resizing Possible","Resizing not Possible")
| summarize CountofVMs=count() by CanResize

1"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"{FinalTable}
costtable
| summarize CostDifference=arg_max(DiffPayg,*) by ResourceId
| join kind=leftouter (costtable
|sort by ResourceId,NewVMCost asc
| summarize possibleSizes = makelist(pack('size', strcat(NewSize , '|',NewVMCost,' | ',vcores,'|',Ram))) by ResourceId,AzureSize
) on ResourceId

{VMSizeList}

| summarize (Cpu)= {AggregatesRight} by Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;

|summarize (IOPs)= {AggregatesRight} by  Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;

2048000, 2048000, minMemoryReq < 2097152, 2097152, minMemoryReq < 2918400, 2918400, minMemoryReq < 3891200, 3891200, minMemoryReq < 3985408, 3985408, minMemoryReq < 4194304, 4194304, minMemoryReq < 5836800, 5836800, 0)

         | extend cpu_resize=iff(Cpu < toint("{CPUThreshold}") and Cpus != 1, "yes", "no") | extend mem_resize=iff(Mem < toint("{MEMThreshold}") and newram < PhysicalMemoryMB, "yes", "no")

                | join kind=leftouter hint.strategy=shuffle (VMPriceAll| where type=="Consumption"   | project  armskuname,VMCost=unitprice,Location) on $left.AzureLocation==$right.Location and $left.AzureSize==$right.armskuname

         | join kind=leftouter hint.strategy=shuffle (VMPriceAll|  where reservationterm == "1 Year"| project  armskuname,NewVM_RI1Y=unitprice,Location,reservationterm) on $left.AzureLocation==$right.Location and $left.Name==$right.armskuname
